sourceMeaningMnemonic: Making a mnemonic for a <radical>crab trap</radical> is <kanji>VERY</kanji> hard. So hard that I couldn't come up with one. But it's very possible that one of you will!
meaningInfo: How hard is it to come up with a good mnemonic for a crab trap? Very hard!
readingMnemonic: You know what else is <kanji>very</kanji> something? <reading>Jean</reading>s (<ja>じん</ja>). Jeans are very expensive. Jeans are very tight. Jeans are very popular. Jeans are very a lot of things.
readingInfo: How many sentences can you make with very and jeans? More than me I hope.
